elementSpec.desc: marks pages in a reference edition.
marca páginas en una edición de referencia.

exemplum.eg: <(La)page n="32"> <!-- text of edition La, page 32 --></(La)page> <(La)page n="33"> <!-- text of edition La, page 33 --> </(La)page> <(La)page n="34"> <!-- text of edition La, page 34 --> </(La)page> <(La)page n="35"> <!-- text of edition La, page 35 --> </(La)page>

remarks.p: May contain col elements, line elements, or character data.
The page element in a concurrent page-reference DTD may be subdivided into columns or lines if desired, or left unanalysed.
